price: ئەمانە ئایەتەکانی خوان دەیان خوێنینەوە بەسەرتدا کە ڕاستن خواش نایەوێت ھیچ ستەمێک بۆ جیھانیان
arabic: تِلۡكَ ءَايَٰتُ ٱللَّهِ نَتۡلُوهَا عَلَيۡكَ بِٱلۡحَقِّۗ وَمَا ٱللَّهُ يُرِيدُ ظُلۡمٗا لِّلۡعَٰلَمِينَ

version.title: Kurdish Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kurdish by Muhammad Saleh Bamuky. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: til'ka āyātu al-lahi natlūhā ʿalayka bil-ḥaqi wamā al-lahu yurīdu ẓul'man lil'ʿālamīna
